original_text: And it came to pass, that, as he was praying in a certain place, when he ceased, one of his disciples said unto him, Lord, teach us to pray, as John also taught his disciples.
korean_text: 예수께서 한 곳에서 기도하시고 마치시매 제자 중 하나가 여짜오되 주여 요한이 자기 제자들에게 기도를 가르친 것과 같이 우리에게도 가르쳐 주옵소서

sentences.original_text: that as he was praying in a certain place
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 어떤 곳에서 기도하고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: one of his disciples said unto him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 제자 중 하나가 그에게 말하였다
주여, 우리에게 기도하는 것을 가르쳐 주십시오

sentences.original_text: as John also taught his disciples
